entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 10:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Temperature: -31.5°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -42

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:50 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
